title: Slow Cooker White Chicken Chili
directions: Place chicken into a 6-qt slow cooker. Stir in chicken stock, green chiles, beans, onion, garlic, cumin and oregano; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Cover and cook on low heat for 7-8 hours or high heat for 5-6 hours.
Remove chicken from the slow cooker and shred, using two forks.
Stir chicken, cilantro and lime juice into the slow cooker; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 avocado, halved, seeded, peeled and sliced
